articles.author: Tech Desk
articles.title: Realme GT to launch in India before Diwali, company confirms - The Indian Express
articles.description: The Realme GT smartphone was recently launched in Europe and it is now all set to make its debut in the Indian market. The device offers flagship-level features at a reasonable price point.
articles.content: Realme GT is set to launch in India before Diwali. The company’s CEO Madhav Sheth has confirmed this in the latest episode of the #AskMadhav online series. The smartphone was recently launched in Eur… [+1455 chars]

articles.author: Kenneth Fox
articles.title: Motorists could be in line for cheaper premiums after EU car insurance probe - BreakingNews.ie
articles.description: The European Commission found Insurance Ireland breached EU antitrust rules, effectively restricting competition in the industry.
articles.content:
Motorists could be in line for cheaper premiums and refunds if the insurance industry is found to have blocked new players from entering the market.
